text: Béla Magyari (8 August 1949 – 23 April 2018) was a Hungarian military official and engineer. He was Colonel of the Hungarian Air Force. He graduated from the Hungarian Airforce Academy "György Kilián" in 1969. He used to be the President of the Hungarian Astronautical Society and worked for the Hungarian Space Office. He was born in Budapest. Magyari died on 23 April 2018 in Budapest at the age of 68.Elhunyt Magyari Béla kiképzett űrhajós index.hu ==References== ==Other websites== *Béla Magyari - Biographies of International Astronauts Category:1949 births Category:2018 deaths Category:European military people Category:Hungarian engineers Category:People from Budapest
title: Béla Magyari
